Class Odometer

  • java.lang.Object

      • Odometer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class Odometer
extends java.lang.Thread
    Basic odometer Also store all the sensor values for any class to call and use when necessary.
    Author:
    Cedric
